lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While the Japanese are out of the business, the Americans have moved in, with First Boston Corp, Salomon Brothers Inc, Goldman, Sachs and Co, Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc and PainWebber Inc leading the charge, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japan allowed local financial institutions last month to start using overseas futures in currencies, bonds and stocks to help them manage their bulging foreign portfolios.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Japanese are in the process of selecting brokers and establishing channels to pay fees and margins, but harmonizing clerical procedures and bridging the time gap between Tokyo and Chicago are proving to be a burden, the sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While the Japanese are out of the business, the Americans have moved in, with First Boston Corp, Salomon Brothers Inc, Goldman, Sachs and Co, Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc and PainWebber Inc leading the charge, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Japanese are in the process of selecting brokers and establishing channels to pay fees and margins, but harmonizing clerical procedures and bridging the time gap between Tokyo and Chicago are proving to be a burden, the sources said.
